thread.title_full: Conferences flying ihgh at the Armouries and New Dock Hall, Leeds

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Conferences flying ihgh at the Armouries and New Dock Hall, Leeds
text:
Conferences flying ihgh at the Armouries and New Dock Hall, Leeds Conferences flying ihgh at the Armouries and New Dock Hall, Leeds Details Category: Venues & Events   12:15 What better way to show off such a stunning location than using this new, innovative, cutting edge technology. Using drone photography of the Royal Armouries Museum and New Dock Hall, in Leeds, will enable us to showcase our beautiful, modern, waterfront surroundings in a way that hasn’t been possible previously. 
It offers clients and customers, some who have never been “up north” before, a bird’s eye view of where their next event will be held in relation to Leeds City Centre. ‘I believe using technological advances is vital in such a fast paced industry. The results of drone photography and video techniques are impressive and it’s great that we can utilise these. I’m really looking forward to seeing the reaction from our clients and believe this will bring us more business’ – James Vincent, Managing Director, Royal Armouries (International) plc.
